channel.title: Two clicks
channel.description: when loading any client and server i can usually loggin. however after that i can only have two clicks in the main window before it crashes and shuts the client. what i mean by main window is i can fiddle around with the armour and items as much as i want, i can type as much as i want but in the bit of the client where you walk and interact with npc's after two clicks in that space the client crashes. i use windows 7 and i have jdk. HELP!
